# clusterwiselmm

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of clusterwiselmm is to provide geometrical clusterwise method for multi-level models (lmm) 

## Installation

You can install the released version of clusterwiselmm from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("clusterwiselmm")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem where we have a 3 levels data organized into 3 unknown groups:
We simulate this data using \code{simulate_data} function provided with the package.

```{r example}
library(clusterwiselmm)
## basic example code
```
